charges.charge_description: 21:952(a), 960(a)(1) and 960(b)(2)(A); 18:3551 et seq. NARCOTICS-IMPORTATION/EXPORTATION-heroin, a Schedule I narcotic drug. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The dft is sentenced to imprisonment for a period of 30 months, to be followed by a 3 year period of supervised release. The dft is assessed the sum of $50.00. Remaining counts are dismissed as per the govt's motion. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(i); 18:3551 et seq. NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-heroin, a Schedule I narcotic drug. (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Remaining counts are dismissed as per the govt's motion for same. (2)

charges.charge_description: Title 21, U.S.C., Section 952(a) and 960. Intentionally and unlawfully import into the United States from a place outside thereof a narcotic drug controlled substance. [1:92-m-1067]
